attributes.additional_details:
"Private D", as he has become known through the press, is the first British soldier to have taken a period of annual leave, and to have flown to the middle east to join in on the fight against the barbaric Islamic State.

This petition, is to recognise that we, as a nation, are proud of this soldier, and his brave decision. We want the Ministry of Defence to waive any charges that may come to Private D as a result of his actions, and let him continue his duties as a soldier.
